channel.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
channel.description:
Image: [url='https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/937003620206698264/C40998AB1FB1088C13B3D303372B2E203097905A/']https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/937003620206698264/C40998AB1FB1088C13B3D303372B2E203097905A/[/url]
What am I supposed to do here? I've already been travelling on the roll-bands and enabled the switch which moved the bridge-part thing. Didn't change anything.

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: scoBocs
item.description:
Giazzo:

Yeah, insulting another person’s mother gratuitously is indeed more mature.

Anyway, I haven’t replied because today I had better things to do than feed a troll. Since I don’t want to start a flame war (upon nothing, really), I will simply keep ignoring you. Just wanted to let you know.

Everything has been written, the view is who is the troll here.

Translated from Catalan:
Tot ha quedat escrit: a la vista està qui és el troll aquí.
(Tanks Mr Google Translator)

Read full topic
item.source: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: scoBocs
item.description:
Giazzo:

Praying to your favourite saint and running at the right time will do.

If you do not know what you talking about, rather than remain silent. Your sense of humor, maybe you will find it very funny, but I think it’s natural for a person immature.

Read full topic

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: scoBocs
item.description:
I have the same problem, I can not go below the pistons. I’ve tried many times. I loaded a previous saved. But there is no way to pass.

(sorry for my bad English)

Read full topic
item.source: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: GreenWins
item.description:
Fendleton:

I’ve heard that sometimes they get out of synch. Try reloading an older save and get through to the pistons ASAP, then sprint under them. I’ve never had problems with it.

That did the trick. I reloaded a previous save and did the whole thing over. Super easy.

Read full topic
item.source: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Eltripas
item.description:
Fendleton:

I’ve heard that sometimes they get out of synch. Try reloading an older save and get through to the pistons ASAP, then sprint under them. I’ve never had problems with it.

That worked, thanks. (I used a save I had before the loading of that scenario, for anyone with the same problem).

Read full topic

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Eltripas
item.description:
Maybe it’s a bug for me because it seems I’m the only one with this problem when I haven’t had any other problem in other areas where you need to crouch jump, sprint, etc. also I find the game fairly balanced and I don’t have major problems dealing with the HECU but this is getting on my nerves!

Read full topic

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
When they all go down, stand against them, holding forward and the sprint key, that way as soon as they go up you’ll speed past them.

Read full topic

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Eltripas
item.description:
How to past those crushing things in the conveyor belt in the residue prepossessing chapter?

Is there a way to turn them off or something or just require ridiculous precision?

I’ve been trying for like 20 minutes now.

Read full topic

item.description:

Please help.

item.title: Residue Processing: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: SoWW
item.description:
Thank you for the tip !

No way to pass through the first set of pistons, I died all the time. But with loading the last autosave (juste in the adjacent room) I succeeded easily on the first try for the two sets !
